Package org.cibseven.bpm.engine.impl.cfg

Interface ProcessEnginePlugin

All Known Subinterfaces:
CamundaAuthorizationConfiguration, CamundaDatasourceConfiguration, CamundaDeploymentConfiguration, CamundaFailedJobConfiguration, CamundaHistoryConfiguration, CamundaHistoryLevelAutoHandlingConfiguration, CamundaJobConfiguration, CamundaMetricsConfiguration, CamundaProcessEngineConfiguration
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCamundaConfiguration, AbstractProcessEnginePlugin, AdministratorAuthorizationPlugin, ApplicationContextClassloaderSwitchPlugin, CamundaBpmRunAdministratorAuthorizationProperties, CamundaBpmRunDeploymentConfiguration, CamundaBpmRunLdapProperties, CompositeProcessEnginePlugin, ConnectProcessEnginePlugin, CreateAdminUserConfiguration, CreateFilterConfiguration, DefaultAuthorizationConfiguration, DefaultDatasourceConfiguration, DefaultDeploymentConfiguration, DefaultFailedJobConfiguration, DefaultHistoryConfiguration, DefaultHistoryLevelAutoHandlingConfiguration, DefaultJobConfiguration, DefaultMetricsConfiguration, DefaultProcessEngineConfiguration, EventPublisherPlugin, GenericPropertiesConfiguration, LdapIdentityProviderPlugin, OAuth2IdentityProviderPlugin, ProcessApplicationEventListenerPlugin, SpinConfiguration, SpinProcessEnginePlugin, SpringBootProcessEnginePlugin, SpringBootSpinProcessEnginePlugin, SpringProcessEnginePlugin, StatementLogProcessEnginePlugin
public interface ProcessEnginePlugin

A process engine plugin allows customizing the process engine

Author:
Daniel Meyer
